DESCRIPTION: Activate #b1 at random: NL - Gain #b3 #yblock. NL - Enemy loses #b5 HP. NL - Draw #b1 card. NL - Apply #b1 #yWeak and #yVulnerable to a random enemy. NL - Gain #b1 #yStrength and #yDexterity this turn. NL - Draw #b1 more card next turn. NL - #yEnergize #b1. NL - Gain #b3 #yVigor. NL - Gain #b1 Temporary HP. NL - Add a random #yMinigame common card with #yPurge.NL - Random enemy loses #b1 HP for each card played afterwards.

Extended minigame list: NL - Random card in hand costs #b1 less this turn. NL - Gain #b1 #yPlated #yArmor and #yMetallicize. NL - Gain #b2 #yThorns. NL - Gain #b1 #yRetaliate. NL - Gain #b1 #yWeave. NL - Upgrade a random card in your hand. NL - Gain #b1 #yArtifact. NL - Add a random common card from any class with #yPurge and #yEthereal. NL - Obtain an Explosive potion. NL - Add a random #yMinigame common card with #yPurge.
After each skill or attack, items lose #b1 durability. NL After durability reaches #b0, items break.
Equip item that empowers Skills and Attacks. Lose #b1 Durability when playing either. Before you grab another, attack by throwing the equipped item.
Gain #b2 damage and #b1 block per level, up to #b3. Lose #b1 whenever you lose HP.
